TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Axis extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea
Public Class Axis Inherits ChartNamedElement Implements IChartMapArea
type Axis = class inherit ChartNamedElement interface IChartMapArea

summary.span: 提供方法和屬性，可用來管理 中的座標軸。

span.span: Provides methods and properties that manage axes in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會封裝為座標軸中的所有功能控制項，並公開， ，並屬性物件。This class encapsulates all the functionality for axes in the control, and is exposed by the , , and properties of objects. 所有的圖表-除了橫條圖、 堆疊橫條圖、 圓形圖和環圈圖-主要和次要軸如下所示：For all charts - except bar, stacked bar, pie and doughnut - the primary and secondary axes are as follows: |軸類型Axis Type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |主要 x 軸Primary X-Axis|底部水平軸。Bottom horizontal axis.| |次要 x 軸Secondary X-Axis|頂端的水平軸。Top horizontal axis.| |主要 y 軸Primary Y-Axis|左側的垂直軸。Left vertical axis.| |次要 y 軸Secondary Y-Axis|右垂直軸。Right vertical axis.| 橫條和堆疊橫條圖有其軸旋轉 90 度順時針旋轉，因此主要 X 軸針對這兩個圖表類型是左垂直軸。Bar and stacked-bar charts have their axes rotated 90 degrees clockwise, so the primary X axis for these two chart types is the left-vertical axis. **附註**針對每個可以有只有一組軸-兩個垂直和兩個水平-物件。**Note** There can be only one set of axes - two vertical and two horizontal - for each object. 類別也包含數種方法，可用來將轉換的軸值，為絕對像素座標，也就是適用於 2D 自訂繪圖，或適用於自訂的 3D 繪圖的相對座標表示。The class also contains several methods that can be used to convert axis values to absolute pixel coordinates, which are useful for 2D custom drawing, or to relative coordinates, which are useful for 3D custom drawing. 絕對與相對座標也可轉換為軸值。Absolute and relative coordinates can also be converted to axis values. 以下是最重要的軸項目所公開類別：The following are the most important axis elements exposed by the class: |Axis 元素Axis Element|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |軸標籤Axis Labels|座標軸，及其相關聯的屬性的標籤。The labels of an axis, and their associated properties.| |格線Grid Lines|主要和次要格線的座標軸。The major and minor grid lines of an axis.| |刻度Tick Marks|座標軸的主要和次要刻度標記。The major and minor tick marks of an axis.| |帶狀線Strip Lines|帶狀線。Strip lines.|

summary.span: 取得或設定平面 (2D) 座標軸的箭頭樣式；這個樣式不會套用至立體 (3D) 圖表區域。

span.span: Gets or sets the arrow style of a two-dimensional (2D) axis; this style is not applied to three-dimensional (3D) chart areas.

value.span: 指定 2D 軸之箭頭樣式的 列舉值。

span.span: An enumeration value that specifies the arrow style of a 2D axis.

span.span: Gets the name of the axis, which can be either X, Y, X2 or Y2.

value.span: 表示座標軸名稱的 列舉值。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual double Crossing { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property Crossing As Double
public: virtual property double Crossing { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Crossing : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸與其相關座標軸交叉的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location at which an axis is crossed by its associated axis.

value.span: 值，這個值表示座標軸與其相關座標軸交叉的位置。

span.span: A value that represents where an axis is crossed by its associated axis.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為主要軸設定這個屬性會決定與另一個主要軸交叉，而同樣地將它設定為次要軸與另一個次要軸的交點它將會決定。Setting this property for a primary axis will determine where the other primary axis crosses it, and similarly setting it for a secondary axis will determine where the other secondary axis crosses it. 例如，設定主要 x 軸的屬性會決定主要 y 軸會跨。For example, setting the property of the primary X-axis determines where the primary Y-axis will cross it. 四種模式可用於座標軸的屬性：Four modes can be used for the property of an axis: - 「 自動 」，這表示在交叉值將相關的座標軸最小值或最大值。"Auto", which means that the crossing value will be set to the minimum or maximum value for the relevant axis. 如果座標軸是次要如果座標軸是主要，值會是最小的值，它會最大值。If the axis is primary, the value will be its minimum value, if the axis is secondary it will its maximum value. 若要在執行階段設定為"Auto"，使用值。To set to "Auto" at run time, use a value. - 「 最低 」，這表示座標軸的交叉點值將會最小值。"Minimum", which means the crossing value of the axis will be its minimum value. 若要在執行階段使用 「 最低 」 設定值。To set to "Minimum" at run-time use a value. - 「 最大值 」，這表示座標軸的交叉點值會是其最大值。"Maximum", which means the crossing value of the axis will be its maximum value. 若要在執行階段使用設定為 「 最大值 」值。To set to "Maximum" at run-time use a value. - 指定`double`相關的座標軸最小和最大值之間的值。A specified `double` value that is between the minimum and maximum values for the relevant axis. 如果在交叉值是小於然後最小的值，或在交叉值大於最大值，將會擲回例外狀況。If the crossing value is less then minimum value, or the crossing value is greater than maximum value, an exception will be thrown. 使用非預設交叉值時，標籤和軸的刻度標記可能會或可能不會遵守交叉軸，取決於屬性設定。When a non-default crossing value is used, the labels and tick marks of the axis may or may not follow the crossing axis, depending on the property setting. 根據預設它們會隨著交叉軸移動。By default they will move with the crossing axis.

summary.span: 取得用來儲存 物件的 物件。

span.span: Gets a object used to store objects.

value.span: 用來儲存 物件的 物件。

span.span: A object used to store objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來新增或移除自訂標籤為座標軸。Use this property to add or remove custom labels for an axis. 使用物件可讓開發人員任意設定軸標籤的文字。Using objects enables the developer to arbitrarily set the text for axis labels. 只有自訂標籤可以用於標籤的第二個資料列。Only custom labels can be used in the second row of labels. 此外，如果第一個標籤資料列中使用自訂標籤，則此第一個資料列中的所有標籤必須都是自訂標籤。Also, if a custom label is used in the first label row, then all labels in this first row must be custom labels. 標籤也可以設定從資料點，或從軸刻度自動產生。Labels can also be set from the data points, or generated automatically from the axis scale.

span.span: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisEnabled Enabled { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisEnabled get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisEnabled value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示座標軸是否已啟用。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an axis is enabled.

value.span: 表示座標軸是否已啟用的 列舉值。

span.span: An enumeration value that indicates whether an axis is enabled.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果座標軸未啟用，不會顯示在軸，以及 （刻度標記、 帶狀線、 標籤、 等等），其屬性。If an axis is not enabled, the axis, along with its attributes (tick marks, strip lines, labels, and so forth), will not be displayed. 軸，以及其所有屬性 （刻度標記、 帶狀線、 標籤、 等等），不論是否使用它來繪製，如果座標軸已啟用，就會顯示。If an axis is enabled, the axis, along with all its attributes (tick marks, strip lines, labels, and so forth), will be displayed regardless of whether or not it is being used to plot a . 如果值為是軸可能會或可能不會顯示，取決於是否使用它來繪製。If a value of is used, an axis may or may not be displayed, depending on whether it is being used to plot a . 取決於用來繪製資料的座標軸和屬性設定。The axes that are used to plot data are determined by the and property settings. > [!NOTE] > 如果座標軸未啟用，但相鄰的座標軸會使用格線，將會取代 未啟用軸顯示其中一個這些格線。If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果將會發生同樣的情況座標軸的屬性設定為，但軸未用來繪製資料; 將改為繪製相鄰座標軸的格線。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to , but the axis is not being used to plot data; the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

Public Function GetPosition (axisValue As Double) As Double

span.span: If an axis is logarithmic, the value is converted to a linear scale.

returns.span: 表示相對位置的 值 (0-100%)。

span.span: A value that represents the relative position (0-100%).

summary.span: 取得或設定交錯式帶狀線的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of interlaced strip lines.

value.span: 物件，表示交錯式帶狀線的色彩。

span.span: A object that represents the color of interlaced strip lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定會顯示當您叫用的交錯式的帶狀線的色彩屬性。Use this property to specify the color of interlaced strip lines that are displayed when you invoke the property. 若要指定交錯式的帶狀線的框線色彩，您必須顯示使用帶狀線集合屬性，而不是屬性。To specify the border color of the interlaced strip lines, you must display the strips using the collection property instead of the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval of an axis.

value.span: 表示座標軸間隔的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the interval of an axis.

value.span: 預設值為 "Auto"，由零 (0) 這個值表示。

span.span: The default value is "Auto", which is represented by a value of zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定的標籤和 主要刻度標記的頻率，以及如果繪製軸相關聯的格線`Interval`的標籤、 刻度標記或格線的屬性值設定為，表示未設定。This property determines how often the labels and major tick marks and grid lines associated with the axis are drawn if the `Interval` property value of a label, tick mark, or grid line is set to , which signifies that it is not set. `Interval`主要刻度標記、 格線或標籤的軸屬性的優先順序高於屬性設定物件。The `Interval` property of a major tick mark, grid line or label of the axis has priority over the property setting of the object. 值為零表示 「 自動 」 值。A value of zero represents an "Auto" value. 這屬性不能設定為。This property cannot be set to . 如果您指派此屬性的值，將改為使用值為零。If you assign this property a value of , a value of zero will be used instead. **請注意**的次要格線和座標軸的刻度永遠不會使用這個屬性其間隔。**Note** The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval. 取決於座標軸的間隔類型屬性。The interval type of the axis is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::IntervalAutoMode IntervalAutoMode { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::IntervalAutoMode get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::IntervalAutoMode value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定旗標，這個旗標會判斷座標軸是否使用固定數目的間隔，或者間隔的數目取決於座標軸的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines if a fixed number of intervals is used on the axis, or if the number of intervals depends on the axis size.

value.span: 決定在座標軸上使用間隔數目之方式的 列舉值。

span.span: An enumeration value that determines how the number of intervals is used on the axis.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為 「 自動 」，屬性會決定應計算多少間隔。When the property is set to "Auto", the property determines how many intervals should be calculated. 如果調整大小或經常重新繪製圖表，您可以設定屬性設，在此情況下，圖表會動態計算軸間隔。If your chart is resized or redrawn often, you can set the property to , in which case the chart will dynamically calculate axis intervals. 這是在圖表間隔顯示的位置以不同的方式，根據其資料的情況下特別有用。This is especially useful in situations where the chart intervals are displayed differently, depending on their data.

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的間隔位移。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset of an axis.

value.span: 表示座標軸間隔位移的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the interval offset of an axis.

value.span: 預設值為 "Auto"，由零 (0) 這個值表示。

span.span: The default value is "Auto", which is represented by a value of zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會判斷座標軸的間隔位移。The property determines the interval offset of an axis. 這個值會做為座標軸的標籤的主要刻度和格線，如果相關聯的軸間隔位移`IntervalOffset`未設定的標籤、 刻度標記或格線的屬性值，表示的值。This value is used as the interval offset of an axis' labels and the major tick marks and grid lines associated with the axis if the `IntervalOffset` property value of the labels, tick marks, or grid lines is not set, which is represented by a value of . 刻度、 標籤和軸的格線 屬性的優先順序高於屬性設定物件。The property of the tick marks, labels and grid lines of an axis has priority over the property setting of the object. 值為零表示 「 自動 」 值。A value of zero represents an "Auto" value. 此外，不能設定為未設定 (也就是)。Also, cannot be set to not set (that is, a ). 如果您指派，將改為使用 「 自動 」-也就是值為零的值。If you assign , a value of "Auto" - that is, a value of zero - will be used instead. **請注意**的次要格線和座標軸的刻度永遠不會使用這個屬性為其間隔位移。**Note** The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval offset. 取決於座標軸的間隔位移的類型屬性。The interval offset type of the axis is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType IntervalOffsetType { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset type of an axis.

value.span: 表示座標軸間隔位移類型的 。

span.span: A that represents the interval offset type of an axis.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會判斷座標軸的間隔位移的類型。This property determines the interval offset type of an axis. 它用於座標軸的標籤、 主要刻度和格線的間隔位移類型如果軸項目本身`IntervalOffsetType`屬性值設定為。It is used for the interval offset type of an axis' labels, major tick marks, and grid lines if the axis element's own `IntervalOffsetType` property value is set to . 將此屬性設定為的值將會導致正在使用 (僅例如主要格線等軸項目可以設為)。Setting this property to will result in a value of being used (only the axis elements such as major grid lines, etc. can be set to ). > [!NOTE] > 次要格線和座標軸的刻度永遠不會使用這個屬性，其間隔位移類型。The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval offset type. 軸的間隔由屬性。The interval of the axis is determined by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會判斷座標軸的間隔類型。This property determines the interval type of an axis. 它用於座標軸的標籤、 主要刻度標記和主要格線的間隔類型如果軸項目本身`IntervalType`屬性值設定為。It is used for the interval type of an axis' labels, major tick marks, and major grid lines if the axis element's own `IntervalType` property value is set to . 將此屬性設定為的值將會導致正在使用。Setting this property to will result in a value of being used. 只有軸項目，例如格線，可以設定為。Only the axis elements, such as grid lines, can be set to . **請注意**的次要格線和座標軸的刻度永遠不會使用這個屬性之間隔類型。**Note** The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval type. 軸的間隔由屬性。The interval of the axis is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelStyle ^ LabelStyle { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelStyle ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelStyle ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the properties of an axis.

value.span: 定義座標軸標籤樣式的 物件。

span.span: A object, which defines the axis label style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定格式、 樣式等等的軸標籤。Use this property to specify the style, formatting, and so forth, of axis labels. 如果屬性是`true`、 字型大小、 字型角度和位移標籤將會自動決定。If the property is `true`, the font size, font angle and the use of offset labels are determined automatically. 如果您將設定 LabelStyle.Font.Size，其中或是屬性，屬性會設定為`false`。If you set any one of the LabelStyle.Font.Size, or properties, the property will be set to `false`. 請注意，如果沒有時間適用於標籤，包含日期的格式和資料點值，可指定時間，時間會影響資料點的位置，即使它們不會顯示由於標籤格式。Note that if a format that consists of a date without a time is used for labels, and the data point values that are used specify times, the times will affect the positions of the data points, even though they are not displayed due to the label formatting.

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸的線條色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the line color of an axis.

value.span: 物件，表示用來繪製座標軸的線條色彩。

span.span: A object that represents the line color used to draw the axis.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定座標軸的線條色彩。Use the property to specify the line color of an axis. **請注意**如果座標軸未啟用，但相鄰的座標軸會使用格線，其中一個這些格線會顯示取代未啟用座標軸。**Note** If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果將會發生同樣的情況座標軸的屬性設定為。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to . 在此情況下，軸未用來繪製資料，並將改為繪製相鄰座標軸的格線。In this case, the axis is not being used to plot data, and the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定用於座標軸的線條樣式。The property determines the line style used for an axis. 行可以是實線、 虛線，等等。The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth. **請注意**如果座標軸未啟用，但相鄰的座標軸會使用格線，其中一個這些格線會顯示取代未啟用座標軸。**Note** If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果將會發生同樣的情況座標軸的屬性設定為。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to . 在此情況下，軸未用來繪製資料，並將改為繪製相鄰座標軸的格線。In this case, the axis is not being used to plot data, and the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得或設定座標軸線條的寬度，單位為像素。The property gets or sets the width of an axis line, in pixels. 如果寬度設定為零 (0)，將不會顯示線條。If the width is set to zero (0), the line will not be displayed. **請注意**如果座標軸未啟用，但相鄰的座標軸會使用格線，其中一個這些格線會顯示取代未啟用座標軸。**Note** If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果將會發生同樣的情況座標軸的屬性設定為。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to . 在此情況下，軸未用來繪製資料，並將改為繪製相鄰座標軸的格線。In this case, the axis is not being used to plot data, and the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

summary.span: 取得或設定對數座標軸的對數基底值。

span.span: A value that represents the logarithm base value for the logarithmic axis.

value.span: 預設值為以 10 為基底。

span.span: The default value is base 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只會沒有作用時屬性設定為`true`。This property only has an effect when the property is set to `true`. 請注意，此屬性僅適用於數值座標軸，可用來繪製資料。Note that this property is only applicable to value axes, which are used to plot data. 設定這個屬性的類別目錄軸，將會導致擲回例外狀況。Setting this property for a categorical axis will result in an exception being thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::Grid ^ MajorGrid { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::Grid ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::Grid ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件，這個物件可用來設定座標軸的主要格線屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a object used to set the major grid line properties for an axis.

value.span: 物件，這個物件可用來取得或設定座標軸的主要格線屬性。

span.span: A object used to get or set the major grid properties of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要格線一律應繪製資料點與搭配使用。Major grid lines are always drawn in conjunction with a data point. 也就是說，它們將會發生在座標軸為類別目錄軸刻度標記的資料點，相同的點。That is, they will occur at the same point along an axis as a data point, for categorical axis tick marks. 值軸，只要標籤就會發生，就會繪製一個預設的主要格線。For value axes, major grid lines by default are drawn wherever labels occur. 您可以使用這個屬性來變更主要格線列頻率、 色彩和其他等等。You can use this property to change major grid line frequency, color, and so forth.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TickMark ^ MajorTickMark { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TickMark ^ get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::TickMark ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件，這個物件可用來設定座標軸的主要刻度標記屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a object used to set the major tick mark properties of an axis.

value.span: 物件，這個物件可用來設定座標軸的主要刻度標記屬性。

span.span: A object used to set the properties of a major tick mark of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要刻度會一律應繪製資料點與搭配使用。Major tick marks are always drawn in conjunction with a data point. 類別目錄軸刻度將會發生在座標軸做為資料點相同的點。Categorical axis tick marks will occur at the same point along an axis as a data point. 值軸的主要刻度標記會繪製依預設，每當標籤就會發生。For value axes, major tick marks are drawn by default wherever labels occur. 您可以使用這個屬性來變更主要刻度標記屬性，例如頻率、 色彩或大小。You can use this property to change the major tick mark properties such as frequency, color, or size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，是否您明確將此值，資料元素的 X 值必須列入考量。Note that if you set this value explicitly, the X-values of data elements must be taken into account. 如果所有資料點 X 值為零，控制項將會假設第一個資料點，就會發生在零處。If all data points have X-values of zero, the control will assume the first data point occurs at zero. 此外，如果明確設定值，則屬性將會被忽略。Also, if the value is explicitly set, the property will be ignored. 值必須小於值。The value must be less than the value. 若要自動將最大和最小的軸值。To automatically round the maximum and minimum axis values. 呼叫方法。call the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RoundAxisValues() cil managed

summary.span: 自動將座標軸的值捨入。

span.span: Automatically rounds axis values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫来四捨五入的座標軸值的方法。Call the method to round the values of an axis. 請注意，呼叫這個方法時，不會變更用於座標軸的間隔。Note that the interval used for the axis will not be changed when this method is called. 這個方法僅適用於 X 和 X2 軸。This method is only supported for the X and X2 axes. Y 和 Y2 的座標軸值會四捨五入預設。The Y and Y2 axes values are rounded by default.

summary.span: 取得或設定座標軸標題的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of an axis title.

value.span: 表示軸標題對齊的 列舉值。

span.span: A enumeration value that specifies the alignment of an axis title.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的對齊方式的值為， ，和。Possible alignment values are , , and . 值為等同於頂端或右邊，根據軸或帶狀線的方向的對齊方式。A value of equates to an alignment to the top or the right, depending on the orientation of the axis or strip line. 以相同方式，也就是值為等同於底部或右邊對齊。In the same manner, a value of equates to an alignment to the bottom or the right. 如果您想要更充分掌控座標軸標題的位置，您必須執行自訂繪圖使用或事件。If you want more control over the positioning of an axis title, you must perform custom drawing using the or event. 您可以進一步對齊和位置的標題物件使用其屬性。You can further align and position the titles of objects by using their property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得或設定標題的字型屬性，例如臉部或大小。Gets or sets title font properties such as face or size. 若要設定字型屬性，在執行的階段、 新必須建立物件。To set font properties at run time, a new object must be created. 任何嘗試變更的目前屬性物件在執行階段將會導致編譯錯誤。Any attempt to change the properties of the current object at run time will result in a compilation error.
